entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low.
